# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [v2.0.2](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar - 2024-03-10

### Commits

- [types] use shared config [`68e9d4d`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [actions] remove redundant finisher; use reusable workflow [`241a68e`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [Tests] increase coverage [`4125c0d`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [Tests] skip `npm ls` in old node due to TS [`01b9282`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [types] improve predicate type [`d340f85`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [Dev Deps] update `tape` [`70089fc`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [Tests] use `@arethetypeswrong/cli` [`50b272c`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar

## [v2.0.1](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar - 2024-02-10

### Commits

- [types] use a handwritten d.ts file; fix exported type [`012b989`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [Dev Deps] update `@types/function-bind`, `@types/mock-property`, `@types/tape`, `aud`, `mock-property`, `npmignore`, `tape`, `typescript` [`977a56f`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [meta] add `sideEffects` flag [`3a60b7b`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar

## [v2.0.0](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar - 2023-10-19

- revamped implementation, tests, readme [`72bf8b3`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- [meta] revamp package.json [`079775f`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
- Only apps should have lockfiles [`6640e23`](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar
